name: T.O. Walton Hall Council
description: To serve as the general governing body affecting residents of Walton Hall. To create an environment in Walton Hall which will encourage self-expression within the acceptable limits, and the expression of students talents in an original and creative manner. To establish desirable standards of moral and social conduct in Walton Hall. To provide opportunities for students in Walton Hall, toassume leadership responsibilities, and to participate in the process of democratic government and group living. To offer opportunities for the students of Walton Hall to develop both physically andsocially. To provide a voice for the students in Walton Hall to express ideas and opinions to the University.
summary: To serve as the general governing body affecting residents of Walton Hall. To create an environment in Walton Hall which will encourage self-expression within the acceptable limits, and the expression of students talents in an original and creative man.
